calculator

Class CalculatorViewController.Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • calculator.CalculatorViewController.Controller
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener
    Enclosing class:
    CalculatorViewController

    private class CalculatorViewController.Controller
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener
    This class is a private inner class of CalculatorViewController to connect to the display of the buttons with user input
    Since:
    1.8.0_181
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Seongyeop Jeong

    • Method Detail

      • actionPerformed

        public void actionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent event)
        This method is to create responding action with user by implmenting the action listener interface. When the action event is occurred by user, this object's action listener will be invoked.
        Specified by:
        actionPerformed in interface java.awt.event.ActionListener
        Parameters:
        event - to get the event of action from the user so that it can be connected to application
